resources.string: Thank you for sharing this app!

"We are all now connected by
the Internet, like neurons in a
giant brain."
-Stephen Hawking
Something went wrong.\nTry checking your connection.
Get Quote of The Day Notification Everyday!
Don\'t show Quote of The Day Notifications.
Get images suitable for all ages.
Looks like you just started!\nHere you\'ll find your daily quotes listed.
Like a quote from somewhere?\nAdd it here!
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
Your beautifully designed quote images will be here!
This app requires storage permissions to save & show images.
This app requires storage permissions so that it can save the image. You can turn off \"Always Save\" feature in settings, however, to avoid saving images before sharing.
This app requires storage permissions so that it can save & show quotes designed by you into the storage.\nPlease grant storage permission in settings.

Thank you for installing Philosofy!\nFollowing are few points that may be helpful.
You can write your quotes (& save at the same time if you want to) by pressing PEN icon, which will open a dialog for the purpose.
Note that text effects like text color, font, shadow etc. are applied to & only when a text is selected. Tap the text to select it. Double tap a misspelled text to edit it.

Delete a font from editor screen by pressing & holding that font. You can add any font to editor from hundreds of fonts any time by pressing CART icon, to launch FONTS screen & starring that particular font. You can use fonts without adding it to editor screen, however, by simply pressing PEN or the sample font.

Though there are already material colors provided already you can choose a custom color by simply pressing the color palette icon. The first three colors in the colors row are the most recent colors chosen from this palette.
